00026 void BroadcastOneNucleonOvlapsPara(OneNucleonOvlapsPara* ONOpar)
00027 {
00028   // send or receive
00029   MPI_Bcast(ONOpar, sizeof(OneNucleonOvlapsPara), MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00030 }

00033 void OneNucleonOvlapsSlave(void)
00034 {
00035   MPI_Status status;
00036 
00037   OneNucleonOvlapsPara ONOpar;
00038   int A;
00039   SlaterDet Q, Qp, Qpp;
00040 
00041   int task;
00042 
00043   BroadcastTask(&task);
00044   if (task != TASKSTART)
00045     return;
00046 
00047   BroadcastOneNucleonOvlapsPara(&ONOpar);
00048   int dim = DIMSPEC* ONOpar.npoints;
00049   BroadcastA(&A);
00050 
00051   complex double specamp[2][dim];
00052 
00053   allocateSlaterDet(&Q, A-1);
00054   allocateSlaterDet(&Qp, A);
00055   allocateSlaterDet(&Qpp, A);
00056 
00057   while (1) {
00058 
00059     BroadcastTask(&task);
00060     if (task != TASKPROJECTONENUCLEONOVLAPSOD)
00061       return;
00062 
00063     double projpar[6];
00064     double *angle, *R;
00065 
00066     BroadcastSlaterDet(&Q);
00067     BroadcastSlaterDet(&Qp);
00068 
00069     while (1) {
00070 
00071       MPI_Recv(projpar, 6, MPI_DOUBLE, 0, TAGPROJECT6, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00072       if (projpar[0] < 0.0)
00073         break;
00074         
00075       angle = &projpar[0];
00076       R = &projpar[3];
00077       
00078       copySlaterDet(&Qp, &Qpp);
00079       moveSlaterDet(&Qpp, R);
00080       
00081       rotateSlaterDet(&Qpp, angle[0], angle[1], angle[2]);
00082 
00083       calcOneNucleonOvlapsod(&ONOpar, &Q, &Qpp, NULL, specamp[0]);
00084 
00085       invertSlaterDet(&Qpp);
00086 
00087       calcOneNucleonOvlapsod(&ONOpar, &Q, &Qpp, NULL, specamp[1]);
00088 
00089       MPI_Send(specamp, 2*dim*sizeof(complex double), MPI_BYTE, 
00090                0, TAGMEOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00091     }   
00092 
00093   }
00094 
00095 }
